front.title: Resource ReserVation Protocol-Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) Path Diversity using Exclude Route

abstract.t: RFC 4874 specifies methods by which path exclusions may be communicated during RSVP-TE signaling in networks where precise explicit paths are not computed by the LSP source node. This document specifies signaling for additional route exclusion subobjects based on Paths currently existing or expected to exist within the network.
